TopicTitle: Fun with Heat Shield + Thermal Cooling?

Articles.Content: Is it possible to put enough cooling units onto a heat shield to allow it to essentially mitigate the heat mechanic, allowing the craft to hit the surface of the Kerbol?

Is it possible to put enough cooling units onto a heat shield to allow it to essentially mitigate the heat mechanic, allowing the craft to hit the surface of the Kerbol?

Maybe up to a point, but they'll get saturated eventually and be overwhelmed.

the static cooling panels are way overpowered at the moment, and you can indeed mitigate 100% of the heat with them during reentry. Not even puny fins (the most basic ones) explode any more if close to a heatsink.
